story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Tailored Tech was founded in 2024 by Benja and Waldo, a small team of engineers from computer and civil engineering backgrounds, with one holding a master's degree and the other a PhD. Our founding team recognized the potential to leverage modern AI technologies to revolutionize how organizations approach their technical challenges.
story.paragraph2: Rather than focusing solely on business cases, we aim to improve and automate processes. The rapid advancement in AI technologies, combined with our expertise and industry experience, allows us to harness these new capabilities to create faster, more efficient, and truly tailored solutions.
story.paragraph3: This insight led us to establish Tailored Tech with a clear mission: to create truly customized technological solutions that address the unique challenges faced by our clients. Today, we continue to fulfill that mission through innovative, precisely crafted systems that make a meaningful difference for the organizations we serve.
story.missionText: To help people, communities, and industries of all levels by combining advanced AI technologies with our specialized knowledge to deliver real, accessible solutions that make a meaningful difference in their daily operations and long-term success.
